description:
The legendary theif called The Black Arachnid caused hovoc in Cattailia City by managing to steal manage valueable treasures and eluding the police by having in partner in crime, a Meowth, use Pay Day to confuse the Police Force.
The Black Arachnid continued to operate until an ancestor of Officer Jenny captured the Black Arachnid using a Spinarak.
name: Kaitou Nekohachi
